title: Using SkiaSharp 3.116.1 causesTelerik app crashed
body:
### Description

The behavior start occurring when Telerik MAUI controls were updated to  3.116.1 in Telerik Maui 11.0.0 version. .
The app crashed.

### Code

The tekerik app crashed.

### Expected Behavior

The app is not crashed.

### Actual Behavior

The bug wii fixed.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.0 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

2.88.9 (Previous)

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

Windows

### Platform / Operating System Version

Windows 10 11 and server 2019,2022,2025

### Devices

_No response_
